00037 #include "..\interfaces.h"

00042 
00043 class Sprite : public IScreenElement
00044 {
00045 protected:
00046         // Position and Pixel data
00047         // -----------------------------
00048         ID3DXSprite *m_d3dSprite;                       // D3D X Sprite
00049         IDirect3DTexture9 *m_pTexture;          // Texture to draw on the Sprite
00050 
00051         CPoint m_Position, m_Hotspot;           // subtract HS from pos to get origin
00052         int m_ZOrder;                                           // the sort order of the sprite
00053         int m_Width, m_Height;                          // dimensions of one frame
00054         int m_TextureWidth, m_TextureHeight;// dimensions of the entire texture
00055         int m_CurrentFrame, m_NumFrames;        // current frame and total frames
00056         bool m_HasColorKey;                             // set to true if the sprite has a color key
00057         bool m_IsVisible;                               // set to true if you want the sprite to draw
00058 
00059         // Members that control animation
00060         // ------------------------------
00061         bool m_IsPaused;                        // set to true if the animation has been paused
00062         bool m_LoopingAnim;                     // set to true if the animation loops
00063         int m_ElapsedTime;                      // the measure of total elapsed time in ms
00064         int m_MSPerFrame;                       // ms per frame (1000 / desired frames per second)
00065 
00066 public:
00067         Sprite();
00068         virtual ~Sprite() { SAFE_RELEASE(m_d3dSprite); SAFE_RELEASE(m_pTexture); }
00069 
00070         virtual CPoint const VGetPos() const { return m_Position; } 
00071         virtual void VSetPos(const CPoint &loc) { m_Position = loc; }
00072         virtual void VSetHotspot(const CPoint &loc) { m_Hotspot = loc; }
00073         virtual void VSetSize(const CPoint &size) { m_Width=size.x; m_Height=size.y; }
00074         virtual CRect const VGetRect() const { return CRect(0,0,m_Width-1,m_Height-1); }
00075         virtual int const VGetWidth() const { return m_Width; }
00076         virtual int const VGetHeight() const { return m_Height; }
00077 
00078         // Implementation of the IScreenElement interface
00079         virtual void VOnUpdate(int deltaMS);
00080         virtual HRESULT VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime);
00081         virtual int VGetZOrder() const { return m_ZOrder; }
00082         virtual void VSetZOrder(int const zOrder) { m_ZOrder = zOrder; }
00083         virtual bool VIsVisible() const { return m_IsVisible; }
00084         virtual void VSetVisible(bool visible) { m_IsVisible = visible; }
00085         virtual LRESULT CALLBACK VOnMsgProc( AppMsg msg ) { return 0; }
00086         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore();
00087 
00088         void *GetSurface() { return m_d3dSprite; }
00089 
00090         // the method that sets the current frame
00091         void SetFrame(const int desiredFrame) { m_CurrentFrame = desiredFrame % m_NumFrames; }
00092 
00093         // the method that retrieves the current frame
00094         int GetFrame() const { return m_CurrentFrame; }
00095 
00096         // the method that returns the number of frames in this animation
00097         int GetFrameCount() const       { return m_NumFrames; }
00098 
00099         void SetAnim(bool isPaused=false, bool looping=true, int msPerFrame=67)
00100                 { m_IsPaused=isPaused; m_LoopingAnim=looping; m_MSPerFrame=msPerFrame; }
00101 };
00102

00105 // --------------------------

00107 class BitmapSprite : public Sprite
00108 {
00109 protected:
00110         std::string m_fileName;
00111         bool m_bInCache;
00112 
00113 public:
00114         BitmapSprite(const std::string fileName, bool inCache, const int frames);
00115 
00116         // Implementation of the IScreenElement interface
00117         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore();
00118 };

00121 class TextSprite : public Sprite
00122 {
00123 protected:
00124         std::wstring m_text;                            // the text to draw
00125         TextStyle m_style;                                      // the style of the text
00126         bool m_isCentered;                                      // justification
00127         optional<CPoint> m_size;                        // a static surface size, or size to fit if size is invalid
00128 
00129 public:
00130         TextSprite (
00131                 std::wstring text,                                      // the text to draw
00132                 TextStyle style,                                        // the style of the text
00133                 bool isCentered,                                        // justification
00134                 const CPoint &position,                         // position of this sprite on the parent surface
00135                 optional<CPoint> size                           // a static surface size, or size to fit if size is invalid
00136         );
00137 
00138         // Implementation of the IScreenElement interface
00139         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore();
00140         HRESULT VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime);
00141 
00142         void SetText(const std::wstring text);                  // changes the text string
00143 };
